Attacks 1 enemy. Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP.

Heals each ally by an extra 2.5% for each debuff on the target.

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of decreasing each enemy's Turn Meter by 20%. Places a 30% [Decrease C. RATE] debuff on the target for 2 turns if they have 50% or more Turn Meter after the Turn Meter decrease.
